# Chat Pruner v13.2.1.0 (2026-01-04)

This version integrates Chat Pruner with the OverEngineeredVTT Suite Monitor and updates minimum compatibility to Foundry VTT v13+.

Added:

- OverEngineeredVTT Suite Monitor dependency for centralized module management
- Standard `line-clamp` CSS property for better browser compatibility
- Comprehensive `.github` folder structure with development references and AI session documentation

Fixed:

- CSS compatibility warnings in VS Code

Breaking Changes:

- **Requires Foundry VTT v13+** - Users on v11 or v12 should continue using v13.2.0.0 (manifest: https://github.com/paulcheeba/chat-pruner/releases/download/v13.2.0.0/module.json)
- **Requires OverEngineeredVTT Suite Monitor** - Automatically installed via Foundry's module dependency system

Manifest URL:

- https://github.com/paulcheeba/chat-pruner/releases/latest/download/module.json

Patreon:

- OverEngineeredVTT - https://www.patreon.com/cw/u45257624

Discord:

- OverEngineeredVTT - Chat Pruner - https://discord.com/channels/1038881475732451368/1454747519920636129
